00130    // inline method definitions 
00131   
00132    /*
00133    * Return the index of the bin for a value.
00134    */
00135    inline int IntDistribution::binIndex(int value) 
00136    { return (value - min_); }
00137   
00138    /*
00139    * Get minimum value in range of histogram.
00140    */

00142    {  return min_; }
00143
